item.description:
Bonjour tout le monde! Do you love French language and culture?
For this meeting, there's a theme! Please come with a photo and tell us a story (in French, of course) about something or somewhere that you went. Something odd or amusing would be good.
Il ya beaucoup de gens who want to practice speaking French. They would like to parler avec vous! Venez for coffee and patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!!
We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month. at 7PM.
Bienvenue!

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French December Meetup
